Description:
Detects the use of tools that copy files from or to remote systems

Author: Ömer Günal
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Remote File Copy
Query: sourcetype like 'linux-%' eql select * from _source_ where ((log like '%scp %' or log like '%rsync %' or log like '%sftp %') and (log like '%@%' or log like '%:%'))
